name: Tanks: The Crusades Game Data
summary: A TANKS file is a game data file used by Tanks: The Crusades, a top-down shooter in which players pilot tanks. It can contain various types of game data, including data used to load levels, campaigns, items, or tanks. TANKS files are plain text files, which can be opened and edited in any text editor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: TANKS file open in Apple TextEdit
images.alt: TANKS file open in Apple TextEdit
